mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tb_noticecomment WHERE nt_no = #{nt_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_noticecomment WHERE ntc_no = #{ntc_no} AND ntc_commenter = #{ntc_commenter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_noticecomment (ntc_no, nt_no, ntc_pcno, ntc_comment, ntc_commenter, ntc_img) VALUES (SEQ_NTC_NO.NEXTVAL,#{nt_no}, #{ntc_pcno, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ntc_comment}, #{ntc_commenter}, #{ntc_img, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT ntc_no, nt_no, NVL(ntc_pcno,ntc_no) as ntc_pcno, ntc_comment, ntc_commenter, ntc_cdate, ntc_update, ntc_img FROM tb_noticecomment WHERE nt_no = #{nt_no} ORDER BY ntc_pcno asc, ntc_no asc
